name: Wild Horse Spirit Adventure
description:
Live the dream of being a free horse and express your passion your way!

This is a game of freedom, love and passion for our favorite animals, suitable for the whole family.

Unleash your wild spirit along the grasslands and create your own animal family.

Wild Horse is a spectacular and peaceful mobile game. Watch the way the horse moves and observe its characteristics. Marvel at majestic horses of different breeds and immerse yourself in the magical and peaceful atmosphere of the game.

Wild Horse will take you to a world that you will never want to return from, full of peaceful environment and cute animals that will give you hugs.

Choose from a variety of cute animals and customize your experience. Live as you want. You have the option to choose whatever you want. Unleash the wild spirit of nature and explore the huge open world we have created for you.

The peaceful and relaxing environments full of unspoiled nature will immerse you in the sweetness of wild nature.
